column3: “Was quite confused at first when I smoked it I was expecting a very intense body high but fr the exact opposite...My tolerance is quite high so I tend to smoke more than most so when I wasn’t feeling the body high I thought I got some bunk but as couple minutes went on and it slowly creeped up on me the body high still light but the head high was INTENSE literally felt fried in my head yet so relaxed very good for si...”
“The break down smells like a fresh tangerine taste like og and tangie had a baby.”
